summary:
I have over 14 years of retail finance experience, currently working as a Marketplace Unit Finance Manager at Nike, leading the full financial planning operations of one of the wholesale channels of Nike EMEA. Previously I worked as the EMEA Commercial Finance Manager, responsible for EMEA financial planning cycles and trade terms of the entire portfolio. 
Before that I was the Credit & Risk Manager and in this role I led company’s wholesale credit management activities for Europe, Middle East and Africa portfolio, overseeing a team of five credit professionals. 
Our most exciting work to date was centralizing the credit management processes among EMEA and then to Global.

'year': 2013}}, 'description': 'PM of a world-class project and vendor team which delivered e-fatura (e-invoicing) for a global Fortune 125 company, which prevented a $12 million USD fine and ensured business continuity in Turkey for that customer.

The project had a must-reach go-live date of 31-Dec-2013 because of new statutory requirements set in Turkey earlier in the year. The core project team, part of a total of 144 extended project team members, worked together to architect, build, and get a government-certified solution which went live successfully 23-Dec-2013.

The project successfully remained within budget, met the strict minimum threshold of performance set by Turkish statute and leveraged a global team to maximize the longest possible window to build, test and implement the solution.

All facets of a high-pressure, high-visibility project were employed for this win.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Yusuf', 'last_name': 'Bahar', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Finance Manager, Nike EMEA'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Justin', 'last_name': 'Lacche, MBA, PMP', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Nike Global Alumni Board of Directors: Unlocking Product, Revenue, AI & Internet of Things'}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Adnan Karaca', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Phil Baker', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Michael Wild', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Brian Mahan', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Ani Joseph', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Richard Frey', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Maarten Klein Haneveld', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'kora', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'YASIN OZBINAR', 'headline': None}]}]
